list.title: 📜 Feeds:
help.text:
Help:
/add → Send the site link (e.g., https://example.com). I’ll auto‑discover an RSS feed or watch the page.
/remove <url> Remove a feed or page‑watch
/list List your subscriptions
/lang Change language
add.invalid_url: ❌ The link seems invalid. Try again or /cancel
add.already_added: ℹ️ This item was already added.
add.feed_found_added: ✅ A feed was found and added to your list.
add.pagewatch_enabled: ℹ️ No RSS found. The page will be intelligently monitored ✅
add.error_generic: ❌ Couldn’t save the link. Please try again later.
